com.aionemu.gameserver.utils
Class PacketSendUtility

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.utils.PacketSendUtility

public class PacketSendUtility
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains static methods, which are utility methods, all of them are interacting only with objects passed as parameters.
These methods could be placed directly into Player class, but we want to keep Player class as a pure data holder.

Author:
Luno
